scripts.public: rm -R public && mkdir -p public && cp assets -R public/assets
scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] index.js > public/app.js
scripts.copy-files: cp index.html public/index.html && cp css/foundation.css public/foundation.css && cp css/app.css public/app.css && cp -R views public/views
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run build-js && npm run copy-files
